name: Python 3
postStartCommand:
echo '#!/bin/bash

if [ "$1" = "up" ]; then
    python /workspaces/greatsun-dev/avatar/avatarUp.py
else
    echo "Unknown command. Use "avatar up" to start the avatar."
fi' > ~/.local/bin/avatar && chmod +x ~/.local/bin/avatar && echo 'export PATH=$PATH:~/.local/bin' >> ~/.bashrc
